snippet.title: DETECTIVE - Stella Porta Case (PS4/PS5/Switch Asia)
snippet.description:
Uncover the connection between a series of mysterious crimes as you investigate in first-person!

Take the role of a detective investigating strange disappearances. In all cases, there is a contract signed by the disappeared supposedly involving an organization called "Stella Porta". Otherwise each case presents a completely different scenario, and your job is to piece together the connections between them.

Investigate the crime scene in first-person perspective and collect all the evidence you can find, taking photographs and picking up items, then analyze what you’ve gathered to help solve the case as the story progresses. Every detail is important, objects and conversations, so you’ll need to be observant in order to move forward. Can you bring these mysterious cases to a close?

Game details:
https://www.eastasiasoft.com/games/DETECTIVE--Stella-Porta-Case

© Jandusoft SL, k148 Game Studio. Licensed to and published by Eastasiasoft Limited.
